sn24.4:4.2: “Kismiṃ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṃ upādāya, kiṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.4:4.3: ‘no cassaṃ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’”ti?
sn24.4:5.1: “Rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṃ upādāya, rūpaṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.4:5.2: ‘no cassaṃ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’ti.
sn24.4:5.6: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṃ upādāya, viññāṇaṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.4:5.7: ‘no cassaṃ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’ti.
sn24.4:6.1: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn24.4:6.3: api nu taṃ anupādāya evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.4:6.4: ‘no cassaṃ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’”ti?
sn24.4:6.11: api nu taṃ anupādāya evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.4:6.12: ‘no cassaṃ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’”ti?
sn24.4:6.14: “Yampidaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā tampi niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn24.4:6.16: api nu taṃ anupādāya evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.4:6.17: ‘no cassaṃ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’”ti?
sn24.4:7.1: “Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa imesu ca ṭhānesu kaṅkhā pahīnā hoti, dukkhepissa kaṅkhā pahīnā hoti … pe …
sn24.4:7.3: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti.
